original_text: Those who live according to the flesh have their minds set on what the flesh desires; but those who live in accordance with the Spirit have their minds set on what the Spirit desires.
korean_text: 육신을 따르는 자는 육신의 일을, 영을 따르는 자는 영의 일을 생각하나니

sentences.original_text: Those who live according to the flesh
have their minds set on what the flesh desires
but those who live in accordance with the Spirit
have their minds set on what the Spirit desires
